title: Designing Learning Transfer Strategies for Online Continuing Professional Development (CPD)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and management/leadership experience
context.additional_context: Offline classes combining theory and practice in a digital-device-supported environment.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize motivational elements (flexibility, customization, autonomy) with over 80% engagement through Self-Determination Theory-based instructional design.
Learners can write and receive feedback on practical application plans in science fields at least three times through reflection and dialogue opportunities based on the Practical Inquiry Model.
Learners can build a peer knowledge-sharing and collaboration system by establishing Virtual Communities of Practice and Professional Learning Networks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
